rows.name: Lists
rows.desc: Keeps track of various lists of things (with infinite sublists!), built with React.js

rows.name: McDermott Projects
rows.desc: A collection of projects to make the McDermott Scholars Program better

rows.desc: Developed at OxHack - summarizes PDFs of your academic papers for easy skimming

rows.desc: Built at HackTech with friends - lets you sync slides with a professor's lecture and take notes on them

rows.name: Time Tracker
rows.desc: Created a web app to keep track of what activities I did during the day for around 75 days

rows.name: UTD JavaScript Camp
rows.desc: Volunteered at a camp to teach high school kids how to code - they uploaded their JavaScript code here
